evaluation_summary.strengths: The audio description effectively captures key visual elements and text on screen, providing a clear narrative for viewers who may not see the visuals. It balances well between inline and extended descriptions.
evaluation_summary.areas_for_improvement: Some descriptions could be more detailed to enhance the visual experience, especially in action sequences. There could also be more emphasis on character emotions and subtle visual cues.

reads_text_on_screen.justification: The audio description accurately reads all text on screen, including movie titles and promotional phrases, at appropriate times.

inline_track_quality.justification: Short descriptions are mostly effective but can sometimes be more detailed to better convey the scene.

extended_track_quality.justification: Longer descriptions provide good context but might benefit from additional details about the environment and character actions.

balance_of_inline_and_extended.justification: There is a reasonable mix of brief and extended descriptions, though some scenes may require a different balance for clarity.

track_placement.justification: The narration is generally well-timed, avoiding conflicts with dialogue and music, but could be slightly adjusted for smoother transitions in some parts.
